page.title: 14Wishmore School Chobham
page.content:
The school is called Wishmore School for boys.All the boys board. They go home for the weekends every other week.
The Head master is called Mr. Geraghty. There are ten teachers. Some teachers live at the school with their families.The teachers are mainly male with the occasional female teacher. There are five matrons as well as cooks, ground keepers, handymen and assistant matrons.
In the school, they have a medium sized library. They have a laundry room which is quite small. The dormitaries have about 15 people in.
